promptGenerator.title: AI Prompt Generator
promptGenerator.subtitle: Upload an image or video to generate optimized prompts for Runway AI. Our system analyzes your media and creates detailed prompts to help you recreate similar images with AI generation tools.

videoGeneration.aspectRatioTip: Aspect ratio is automatically matched from your uploaded image.
videoGeneration.noImages: Select images from the prompt generator and click ADD to add them here for video generation

fileUpload.supportedFormats: Supports images (JPG, PNG, WebP) and videos (MP4, MOV, AVI)

fileUpload.ratioResolutionTip: These settings will be used for both image generation and video creation. Video generation will automatically match the image ratio.
